response.original_title: Much Ado About Nothing - Filho do Meio
response.overview: Shakespearean comedy about two pairs of lovers in Messina, Italy: the quick-witted Beatrice and Benedick, and the young lovers Claudio and Hero. While Beatrice and Benedick initially trade insults, they are tricked into falling in love with each other by their friends. In contrast, the villainous Don John successfully tricks Claudio into believing Hero is unfaithful, leading to a public shaming at their wedding. A plan to fake Hero's death eventually exposes Don John's plot, leading to the shame-faced Claudio marrying a disguised Hero and Beatrice and Benedick finally confessing their love for one another.
response.title: Much Ado About Nothing - Filho do Meio
